entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain and ending late this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
